[[Rumi]], [[Hafez]] and [[Saadi (poet)|Sa'di]] are icons of the passion and love that the Persian culture and language present. The Persian word for love is ''eshgh'', deriving from the Arabic ''ishq''. In the Persian culture, everything is encompassed by love and all is for love, starting from loving friends and family, husbands and wives, and eventually reaching the divine love that is the ultimate goal in life. In the Persian culture, everything is encompassed by love and all is for love, starting from loving friends and family, husbands and wives, and eventually reaching the divine love that is the ultimate goal in life.
